description: The Afghan asylum-seeker lost his six-year-old son after crossing from Turkey earlier this month.
title: Greece migrants: Afghan father charged over son's drowning death
title_page: Greece migrants: Afghan father charged over son's drowning death - BBC News
maintext: His lawyer told the BBC that although a distress call went out to the coastguard at midnight, they only sent a vehicle to look for the body six hours later.
